Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Lucx skill for Amazon Alexa, you can now interact with your lighting. There is no more need to walk to the switch to turn a light on or off. Just ask your assistant through a voice command and she will help.

To take advantage, it will be necessary to connect Alexa to the Lucx devices through the following steps:
(1)Download the "Lucx" app from your app store.
(2) Register your account via email or telephone contact.
(3) You should have some "Lucx" equipment on hand.
(4) Configure these equipment in the "Lucx" application, adjusting the names that will be spoken when using the skill.
(5) Download the Amazon "Alexa" app from your app store.
(6) Configure your Alexa device in the app.
(7) Look for the skill "Lucx" in the skills tab of the app.
(8) Click enable skill and you will be redirected to login screen.
(9) Enter your password user data used in the "Lucx" registry.
(10) Ready. Setup is complete.

You are now able to use commands like:
"Alexa, turn on the kitchen light"
"Alexa, turn off the living room light"
